1.title: Four Seasons Maldives: Part 1
1.plot: Explore the exotic oppulence of the Four Seasons Resort Maldives at Landaa Giraavaru.

2.title: Four Seasons Maldives: Part 2
2.plot: Part 2 of our visit to the Four Seasons Resort Maldives at Landaa Giraavaru.

3.title: Atlantis the palm - part 1
3.plot: The first resort built on Dubai's stunning man-made island, the Palm, the Atlantis resort is a magical architectural blend of the ancient Greek myth with distinctly modern Arabian elements.

4.title: Atlantis the palm - part 2
4.plot: Part 2 of our visit to Atlantis, The Palm resort located in Dubai.

5.title: Closenburg sri lanka
5.plot: Nestled in the green expanse of Sri Lanka, the tranquil resort of Closenburg is near such heritage sites the Galle fort, natural harbor, St Mary's Cathedral and the National Maritime museum.

6.title: One and only reethi rah - part 1
6.plot: Amidst the leisurely air of the Maldives, surrounded by piercing blue waters, is the magical fantasy resort called the Reethi Rah Hotel. A one-of-kind tropical haven.

7.title: One and only reethi rah - part 2
7.plot: Your host Kim brings you part 2 of the One and Only Reethi Rah, where you'll experience all there is to offer from yoga to local cuisine and activities at the resort.

8.title: One and only le saint geran
8.plot: Incomparable and distinguished, Le Saint Géran sits peacefully in the silver white sands, balmy winds and crystal clear waters that are sure to rejuvenate your spirits. The rugged yet sophisticated resort bathes you in beauty and luxury.

9.title: Heritage le telfair
9.plot: The verdant greens and the expansive meadows of Heritage Le Telfair presents one of the most premiere golfing greens in the world. The Heritage Le Telfair is unique, unmatchable, breathtaking.

10.title: Six senses samui
10.plot: Located on the magnificent northern tip of Koh Samui, Six Senses Samui stands amidst 20 acres of lush and oppulent flora, and rewards its lucky guests with palatial views of the Gulf of Siam and other far-off islands.

11.title: Amansara - part 1
11.plot: Amansara is situated in Siem Reap, the cultural capital of Cambodia, just 10 minutes from the entrance to the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Angkor. Come explore Khmer culture and magnificent ruins of the Angkor.

12.title: Amansara - part 2
12.plot: Part 2 of the Amansara Hotel. Set in a garden, built by a French architect in 1962, the tranquility at the resort is ideal for visitors who come to explore the Khmer culture.

13.title: Desroches - part 1
13.plot: Immaculate white sandy beaches, incredible marine life, exquisite tropical forests, and exotic hideaways, the Desroches Resort delivers all the wonder of the serene islands of Seychelles. Nature has blessed Seychelles with beauty and one of its most devine jewels is the Desroches Resort.

14.title: Desroches - part 2
14.plot: Part 2 of Desroches Island Resort. Named to Forbes Top 10 Remote Destinations in the World, this exotic wonderland of adventure will indulge you.

15.title: Die swaene
15.plot: Reflecting the heritage of the enchanting medieval city Bruges in Belgium, Die Swaene is a jewel of a hotel overlooking a beautiful canal. A visual feast with its antiques and architecture. Warm hospitality and delectable cuisine make it the ideal getaway.

16.title: Huvafen fushi - part 1
16.plot: Ever wanted to master the art of doing absolutely nothing in panoramic surroundings? We know just the place. The Huvafen Fushi's tropical island retreat in the Maldives is where one's dearest dreams will surely come true.

17.title: Huvafen fushi - part 2
17.plot: Part 2 of our stay at Huvafen Fushi Hotel in the Maldives Islands. Pristine waters below your ocean bungalow's glass floor. Immersed in surreal beauty in a private courtyard onshore. "Rooms" at sea fitted with modern indulgences.

18.title: Great world hotles: one and only the royal mirage and one and only the palm
18.plot: One of Dubai's newst edition is the Palm Jumeriah, and the beautiful One and Only Resort. This scenic man made wonder has added more feathers to Dubai. This Great World Hotel offers Luxury par excellence.

19.title: The residence hotel mauritius
19.plot: Situated in the land of lagoons and palm fringed white sandy beaches is The Residence Hotel-Mauritius. The residence signifies timeless beauty and the blend of romantic touch of nostalgia.This extravagant hotel proves to be the perfect relaxation spot.

imdb.title: Great World Hotels
plot: Embark on a journey with the host and explore some of the most luxurious hotels around the world.
